Title: The Slaughterhouse
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Neil Campbell, David Phillips (executive story editor), Justin Noble (executive story editor), Carly Hallam (story editor), Alexis Wilkinson (story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: Jake and Rosa attempt to earn their idol's respect.
